meta.title: Insta-Webyar ‚Äî Official Social Story OS
meta.description: Design, localize, and launch polished Instagram stories with a premium, mobile-first workflow tuned for modern teams.
meta.ogImageAlt: Insta-Webyar dashboards showcased across light and dark themes

announcement.label: Spring release
announcement.message: Introducing motion presets, AI captions in 32 languages, and real-time collaboration.

hero.title: Make social storytelling feel bespoke, every single time
hero.description: The official Insta-Webyar theme combines Vazirmatn typography, cinematic motion, and AI-assisted writing so your brand looks premium across light and dark modes.
highlights: Adaptive layouts respond to every device width and input type
Curated palette system with instant light / dark parity
Collaboration timeline with contextual voice notes

features.title: Every layer tuned for premium UI/UX
features.subtitle: Build immersive campaigns with modular design primitives and AI assistance.

sections.title: Template Atelier
sections.description: Swap between 240+ cinematic compositions, animate elements with choreographed easing, and export in retina-perfect formats.

bullets.title: Precision layouts
bullets.description: Auto-adjust typography, margins, and imagery with smart breakpoint rules.

bullets.title: Contextual AI
bullets.description: Generate localized captions, alt text, and CTA ideas based on your creative brief.

bullets.title: Motion recipes
bullets.description: Apply tasteful transitions and micro-interactions built with GPU-optimized animation tokens.

sections.title: Brand Command Center
sections.description: Keep every asset on-brand with enforceable guardrails and collaborative review flows.

bullets.title: Guardrails
bullets.description: Lock fonts, spacing, and tone to maintain official brand presence.

bullets.title: Approvals
bullets.description: Route story drafts through comments, annotations, and sign-off checkpoints.

bullets.title: Asset vault
bullets.description: Manage reusable overlays, stickers, and music beds in one organized system.

sections.title: Automation Playbooks
sections.description: Trigger workflows that personalize stories, schedule posts, and analyze engagement in real time.

bullets.title: Smart scheduling
bullets.description: Coordinate posts with AI-generated best-time insights across time zones.

bullets.title: Live dashboards
bullets.description: Monitor reach, saves, taps, and conversions with signature Pro UI widgets.

bullets.title: Reusable flows
bullets.description: Clone entire campaigns, remix assets, and automate publishing to every channel.

experience.title: Experience the official Insta-Webyar flow
experience.subtitle: Designed mobile-first with pixel-perfect responsiveness and thoughtful accessibility.

pillars.title: Immersive workspace
pillars.description: Arrange blocks with drag handles, advanced snapping, and real-time device previews.

pillars.title: Collaborative canvas
pillars.description: Leave inline feedback, mention teammates, and resolve threads with audit-ready history.

pillars.title: Insight-driven decisions
pillars.description: Blend qualitative storytelling with quantitative analytics in a unified panel.

cards.title: Responsive by design
cards.description: Story frames scale fluidly from 320px mobile breakpoints up to 4K displays using fractional spacing and type ramps.
points: RTL-aware layouts with Vazirmatn as default script
Configurable safe areas for platform overlays

cards.title: Dark mode that feels intentional
cards.description: Colors, shadows, and typography invert using perceptually-uniform tokens for consistent contrast.

workflow.title: A guided path from idea to publish

steps.title: Brief & moodboard
steps.description: Input campaign goals, drop inspiration references, and let the AI moodboard curate assets that match your tone.

steps.title: Compose & adapt
steps.description: Drag, resize, and adapt templates with live breakpoints, auto-captioning, and guided contrast checks.

steps.title: Preview & launch
steps.description: Simulate taps, hold interactions, and schedule across platforms with automation hooks.

analytics.title: Insights that surface the why
analytics.subtitle: Understand audience sentiment, conversion paths, and creative performance from a single command center.

cards.title: Engagement intelligence
cards.description: See swipe-away reasons, next-best-action suggestions, and AI-generated experiment ideas.

cards.title: Attribution clarity
cards.description: Trace link clicks to downstream sales, retarget top segments, and export investor-ready reports.

cards.title: Team operations
cards.description: Track review cycles, production velocity, and utilization to keep teams aligned.

items.name: GlowUp Cosmetics
items.headline: +212% story saves in 45 days
items.summary: Automated content calendars and data-driven A/B tests led to a viral seasonal launch.

items.name: Voyage Mobility
items.headline: Global rollout with localized assets
items.summary: Leveraged RTL-ready themes and motion recipes to coordinate launches across 18 markets.

items.quote: The official Insta-Webyar theme feels like an internal creative team in a box‚Äîpolished, fast, and reliable.
items.author: Dorsa Rahimi

items.quote: We standardized every campaign workflow with Insta-Webyar. Feedback cycles dropped from days to minutes.
items.author: Reza Moghimi

items.quote: Dark mode finally looks intentional. The contrast, the micro-interactions, the typography‚Äîit's agency-level.
items.author: Sara Farhadi

pricing.title: Flexible plans for every stage
pricing.subtitle: Start with light mode, go pro with dark mode, and scale with automation. All tiers include the official theme.

items.question: Does Insta-Webyar support RTL scripts?
items.answer: Absolutely. The official theme ships with Vazirmatn as the default Farsi typeface and dynamic line-height adjustments.

items.question: Can we import motion presets?
items.answer: Yes. Upload Lottie, After Effects JSON, or Insta-Webyar native presets and apply them with GPU-accelerated easing.

items.question: How secure is the asset vault?
items.answer: We provide end-to-end encryption, audit logs, and SSO with granular permissions.
